section.title: Eclipse Autobuilder
section.para: You can now also use Eclipse to automatically create your DocBook output.
On your project right-click with the mouse. Select Properties. Go to Builder and press New. Select Ant build and select your existing ant build.xml file.
Under targets select Select-targets in the Auto-Build section and select your target.
On the tab Build Options you can specify a working set for relevant resources. This would be your source folder.
Now Eclipse will create your new output always after saving.
